openings.description: Large windows for maximum natural light, oriented eastwards to harness morning sunlight.
Front entrance door with ample width and integrated security features.
Balcony area facilitating additional natural light, ventilation, and outdoor seating.
A dedicated access to the swimming pool area, ensuring safe transition from indoors to outdoors.

levels.notes: The design incorporates Vastu principles with a west-facing plot emphasis, prioritizing natural light and ventilation. Irregularities in the plot have been addressed by flexible room layouts and adaptive spaces that maintain the Bohemian aesthetic while optimizing structural integrity.
